bibl.title: Scribal Habits in the Early Greek New Testament Papyri.

series.title: New Testament Tools, Studies and Documents.

bibl.note: Diss. Graduate Theological Union, 1981. - 1. The study of scribal habits. - 2. Singular readings. - 3. Methodology. - 4. The scribe of P45. - 5. The scribe of P46. - 6. The scribe of P47.- 7. The scribe of P66. - 8. The scribe of P72. - 9. The scribe of P75. - 10. The shorter reading? - 11. Concluding remarks. - Supplementary Notes. - Appendix A. The singular readings of the papyri; - Appendix B. The correction of the papyri; - Appendix C. Orthographic phenomena; - Appendix D. Summary of results. - Bibliography. Indexes.
